values.name: Created
values.description: The upload process has been initiated. The client should upload the upload manifest file using the SAS-signed upload URI provided by the system

values.name: GeneratingSpecialFilesUploadInfo
values.description: The system is analyzing the upload manifest file uploaded by the client and generating the upload information for uploading special files.

values.name: GeneratedSpecialFilesUploadInfo
values.description: The system has analyzed the upload manifest file and generated the upload information for uploading special files.

values.name: GeneratingDataFilesUploadInfo
values.description: The system is sharding the files and generating the upload information for uploading data files.

values.name: GeneratedDataFilesUploadInfo
values.description: The system has sharded the files and generated the upload information for uploading data files. The client should upload the measurement files using the SAS-signed upload URIs provided by the system.

values.name: Completing
values.description: The system is completing the upload process (creating measurements etc.)

values.name: Completed
values.description: The system completed the upload process

values.name: Aborting
values.description: The system is cancelling the upload process

values.name: Aborted
values.description: The system cancelled the upload process

values.name: Failed
values.description: The system marked the upload process as failed
